name: think
description:
Reason about the problem before acting. This tool has no side effects and does not modify files.

Use it for:
- summarizing what you learned from reads
- deciding the next tool call
- avoiding repeated errors/loops

Examples:
- {{tool:think}}({"thought": "I read source+spec; next I should patch ComputeCell callback ordering."})
- {{tool:think}}({"thought": "Write was no-op. I should read with diff=true and switch to edit."})

Returns: ok: thought recorded

thought.description: Your short analysis of current state and next action
